SSC-110-002:
A department ID that does not exist is specified.
{{lines}}
Check the registered department ID.
If you want to add a new department, enter the department ID in the blank.
SSC-130-002:
A non-existent regulation type is specified.
{{lines}}
If you want to add a specified type, please do so from the specified type setting.
In case of incorrect input of the specified type, enter the correct specified type name.
SSC-130-003:
A regulation ID that does not exist is specified.
{{lines}}
If you want to change the existing regulation name, enter the regulation ID you want to change.
If you want to add a new regulation, enter the regulation ID in the blank.

{{lines}}

Please upload without duplication.

SSC-150-020:
The task that occurs each time contains a due date setting.
(You can enter any of the following dates: weekly due date, monthly due date, monthly due date (designated on the ◯ th day of the week), yearly due date, every year on the due date (designated on the XX day of the week))
{{lines}}
If you want to register a task that occurs each time, leave the due date setting blank and upload.
SSC-150-021:
A task with a deadline has multiple due dates.
(There are tasks for which two or more types are entered: weekly due date, monthly due date, monthly due date (designated on the ◯ th day of the week), yearly due date, yearly due date (designated on the ◯ th day of the week), and arbitrary due date)
{{lines}}
When registering a task with a deadline, set one type of deadline and upload it.
